inspirational.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
inspirational.author: Steve Jobs

inspirational.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
inspirational.author: Theodore Roosevelt

inspirational.quote: Your limitation—it's only your imagination.
inspirational.author: Unknown

inspirational.quote: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
inspirational.author: Unknown

inspirational.quote: Great things never come from comfort zones.
inspirational.author: Unknown

inspirational.quote: Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
inspirational.author: Unknown

inspirational.quote: Success doesn’t just find you. You have to go out and get it.
inspirational.author: Unknown

inspirational.quote: The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
inspirational.author: Unknown

inspirational.quote: Dream bigger. Do bigger.
inspirational.author: Unknown

inspirational.quote: Don’t stop when you’re tired. Stop when you’re done.
inspirational.author: Unknown

inspirational.quote: Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
inspirational.author: Unknown

inspirational.quote: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
inspirational.author: Sean Patrick Flanery

inspirational.quote: Little things make big days.
inspirational.author: Unknown

inspirational.quote: It’s going to be hard, but hard does not mean impossible.
inspirational.author: Unknown

inspirational.quote: Don’t wait for opportunity. Create it.
inspirational.author: Unknown

inspirational.quote: Sometimes we’re tested not to show our weaknesses, but to discover our strengths.
inspirational.author: Unknown

inspirational.quote: The key to success is to start before you are ready.
inspirational.author: Marie Forleo

inspirational.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
inspirational.author: Winston Churchill

inspirational.quote: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
inspirational.author: Tony Robbins

inspirational.quote: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
inspirational.author: Albert Einstein

life.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
life.author: John Lennon

life.quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
life.author: Helen Keller

life.quote: Many of life’s failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
life.author: Thomas A. Edison

life.quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
life.author: Mae West

life.quote: The unexamined life is not worth living.
life.author: Socrates

life.quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
life.author: Oprah Winfrey

life.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
life.author: Walt Disney

life.quote: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
life.author: Will Rogers

life.quote: You learn more from failure than from success. Don't let it stop you. Failure builds character.
life.author: Unknown

life.quote: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.
life.author: Vince Lombardi

life.quote: If you are going through hell, keep going.
life.author: Winston Churchill

life.quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
life.author: Socrates

life.quote: Without music, life would be a mistake.
life.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

life.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
life.author: Confucius

life.quote: Life is never fair, and perhaps it is a good thing for most of us that it is not.
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
life.author: Oprah Winfrey

life.quote: Life is short, and it is up to you to make it sweet.
life.author: Sarah Louise Delany

life.quote: Keep smiling, because life is a beautiful thing and there's so much to smile about.
life.author: Marilyn Monroe

life.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
life.author: Albert Einstein

love.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
love.author: Lao Tzu

love.quote: Love does not consist in gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction.
love.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

love.quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
love.author: Audrey Hepburn

love.quote: We are most alive when we're in love.
love.author: John Updike

love.quote: The heart wants what it wants. There's no logic to these things.
love.author: Woody Allen

love.quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
love.author: Aristotle

love.quote: Where there is love there is life.
love.author: Mahatma Gandhi

love.quote: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend.
love.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

love.quote: Love is an irresistible desire to be irresistibly desired.
love.author: Robert Frost

love.quote: The art of love is largely the art of persistence.
love.author: Albert Ellis

love.quote: Love is when you meet someone who tells you something new about yourself.
love.author: Andre Breton

love.quote: Love is the bridge between two hearts.
love.author: Unknown

love.quote: Love is not about how many days, months, or years you have been together. Love is about how much you love each other every day.
love.author: Unknown

love.quote: Love is the voice under all silences, the hope which has no opposite in fear; the strength so strong mere force is feebleness.
love.author: E.E. Cummings

love.quote: Love is an endless act of forgiveness.
love.author: Unknown

love.quote: Love is the greatest refreshment in life.
love.author: Pablo Picasso

love.quote: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
love.author: David Viscott

love.quote: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
love.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

love.quote: Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it.
love.author: Nicholas Sparks

love.quote: Love is not finding someone to live with; it's finding someone you can't live without.
love.author: Rafael Ortiz

humor.quote: I'm not lazy, I'm on energy-saving mode.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I told my wife she was drawing her eyebrows too high. She looked surprised.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I used to think I was indecisive, but now I'm not so sure.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I'm great at multitasking. I can waste time, be unproductive, and procrastinate all at once.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I asked my dog what's two minus two. He said nothing.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I told my computer I needed a break, and now it won't stop sending me Kit-Kat ads.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I'm reading a book about anti-gravity. It's impossible to put down!
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I'm not arguing, I'm just explaining why I'm right.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I used to be a baker, but I couldn't make enough dough.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I'm not clumsy, I'm just testing gravity.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I told my plants I love them. Now they won't stop photosynthesizing.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I'm not a complete idiot, some parts are missing.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I'm not saying I'm Batman, but have you ever seen us in the same room?
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I'm not arguing, I'm just passionately expressing my right to be wrong.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I'm not short, I'm just concentrated awesome!
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I'm not ignoring you, I'm prioritizing.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I'm not procrastinating, I'm doing a 'stress test' on my deadline.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I'm not messy, I'm organizationally challenged.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I'm not old, I'm retro!
humor.author: Unknown

romance.quote: In all the world, there is no heart for me like yours. In all the world, there is no love for you like mine.
romance.author: Maya Angelou

romance.quote: I saw that you were perfect, and so I loved you. Then I saw that you were not perfect and I loved you even more.
romance.author: Angelita Lim

romance.quote: You are the last thought in my mind before I drift off to sleep and the first thought when I wake up each morning.
romance.author: Unknown

romance.quote: If I know what love is, it is because of you.
romance.author: Hermann Hesse

romance.quote: I need you like a heart needs a beat.
romance.author: Unknown

romance.quote: I love you not only for what you are, but for what I am when I am with you.
romance.author: Roy Croft

romance.quote: I look at you and see the rest of my life in front of my eyes.
romance.author: Unknown

romance.quote: I love you, and that's the beginning and end of everything.
romance.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

romance.quote: I swear I couldn't love you more than I do right now, and yet I know I will tomorrow.
romance.author: Leo Christopher

romance.quote: You have bewitched me, body and soul, and I love, I love, I love you.
romance.author: Jane Austen

romance.quote: I would rather spend one lifetime with you, than face all the ages of this world alone.
romance.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

romance.quote: My love for you is a journey, starting at forever and ending at never.
romance.author: Unknown

romance.quote: I am who I am because of you. You are every reason, every hope, and every dream I've ever had.
romance.author: Nicholas Sparks

romance.quote: If I had a flower for every time I thought of you... I could walk through my garden forever.
romance.author: Alfred Tennyson

romance.quote: You are my today and all of my tomorrows.
romance.author: Leo Christopher

romance.quote: I love you to the moon and back.
romance.author: Sam McBratney

romance.quote: I choose you. And I'll choose you over and over and over. Without pause, without a doubt, in a heartbeat. I'll keep choosing you.
romance.author: Unknown

romance.quote: I love you, not only for what you have made of yourself, but for what you are making of me.
romance.author: Roy Croft

romance.quote: I carry your heart with me (I carry it in my heart).
romance.author: E.E. Cummings

romance.quote: You are the source of my joy, the center of my world and the whole of my heart.
romance.author: Unknown
